content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was previously commanded to browse the website "https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/page/medical-tourism" for customs and traditions of different countries, but the website only provided information on medical tourism and health-related topics. Now, I received a command to browse the website "https://www.un.org/en/observances/cultural-diversity-day" with the question "What are some customs and traditions of different countries?"'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information about specific customs and traditions of different countries. It discusses the importance of cultural diversity for dialogue and development, the role of intercultural dialogue in achieving peace and sustainable development, and the UNESCO Culture|2030 Indicators as a framework of thematic indicators to measure and monitor the progress of culture’s enabling contribution to the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals. It also mentions the World Day for Cultural Diversity for Dialogue and Development as an opportunity to deepen understanding of the values of cultural diversity and advance the goals of the UNESCO Convention on the Protection and Promotion of the Diversity of Cultural Expressions. \n \n Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.un.org/en/observances/cultural-diversity-day#main-content)', 'Welcome to the United Nations (https://www.un.org/)', 'العربية (https://www.un.org/ar/observances/cultural-diversity-day)', '中文 (https://www.un.org/zh/observances/cultural-diversity-day)', 'English (https://www.un.org/en/observances/cultural-diversity-day)']"}]
"""
